label: axiom-projection-compatibility
statement: Projection compatibility: There exists a function $R_{\mathcal Y}:\varphi(\mathcal X)\to\mathbb R$ such that $R = R_{\mathcal Y}\circ\varphi$ on $\mathcal X$. Equivalently, if $\varphi(x)=\varphi(x')$ then $R(x)=R(x')$.
mathematical_expression: R = R_{\mathcal Y}\circ\varphi \text{ on } \mathcal X \text{, i.e., } \varphi(x)=\varphi(x') \Rightarrow R(x)=R(x')
name: Axiom of Projection Compatibility
